name: Hotel Sea Crown
details: Situated on the beachfront and offering a 24-hour front desk, Hotel Sea Crown is located just 1.5 km from the famous Sugandha Beach. Free WiFi access is available. Each air-conditioned room here will provide you with a seating area and work desk. Featuring a shower, private bathroom comes with free toiletries. At Hotel Sea Crown you will find a garden. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage. The property offers free parking.
